adHeader: Antique & Sculpture Restoration, Fabrication and Repair
adDetails: We are a full service art and restoration service specializing in 3D objects, in business since 1971. Over 40 years experience reconditioning and repairing sculpture and metal furniture; designing and fabricating bases stands and pedestals for antiques and sculpture. Complete fabrication facilities available for all metals: bronze,stainless, monel, copper, and steel. Expertise in patinas, re-waxing and special finishes. We can also write condition reports for insurance coverage and claims. Our clients include the De Young Museum, UC Berkeley Asian Collection, the Oakland Museum of California, the City of San Francisco, and the Bufano Society. Email us for a consultation and let us help you realize your project.
